JOB DESCRIPTION: Job   Description     We are looking for a Software support Engineer     Software Support Engineers    *who can work in night shifts , like a customer support in call centers.(only male resource)     Responsibilities and Duties       Software Support Engineers   serve primarily to address technical issues relating to software implementation, function and upgrades.
